dist/exercise/assets/scene/style.css
#scene { position: relative; height: 100%; width: 60%; } #scene::before { content: '(0, 0)'; color: #FFF; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 2px; opacity: 0.25; } #scene::after { content: '('attr(data-width)', 'attr(data-height)')'; color: #FFF; position: absolute; bottom: 0; right: 2px; opacity: 0.25; }
